Pre-Game Insights: The match is crucial for USA's qualification into the Super 8 stage of the World Cup.
Ireland is struggling after a loss to India and a shock against Canada, making this game a must-win for them.
USA and Ireland faced each other in a 2-match T20I series in December 2021, with USA securing a 26-run win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is being played at Central Broward Park in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, under conditions affected by heavy rain.
The track has been a batsman's paradise historically but will be damp and overcast for the game.
Others: Pakistan's qualification hopes rest on the outcome of this match and their subsequent game against Ireland.
The match is part of Group A of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024.
